column1: '''Ned Smithson''' was the son of [[Smith Smithson]], the title character of the story ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'', and [[Nell Smithson]].  His sister was [[Nan Smithson
column2: Nan]].  When he became an adult he followed in his father's profession as the village smith.  When Smith had given up his [[Fay-star]] Ned kindly told his father that he had much to do with him in the village smithy, and much else to teach him.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''</ref>
